name: CheerVoucher Global Gifting Solutions
tag_list: gift, gifting, vouchers, mobile-vouchers, instant-vouchers, gift-cards, india, reward, bangalore, mall
overview:
CheerVoucher.com is an e-commerce site where customers from around the world can buy gift vouchers of various brands and deliver them to anyplace in India.

Their e-gift vouchers are delivered instantly to the recipient as an SMS and via e-mail. They have tie-ups with Malls in Bangalore right now with more cities in the pipeline.

Physical Vouchers of over 50 popular chains of stores & restaurants can be redeemed across India

The unique feature of CheerVoucher.com is that they offer universal gift cards that can be used to select either mobile or physical vouchers covering over 500 brands. These Gift Cards can be delivered anywhere in Bangalore quickly and free of charge. They have no expiry date, which means unlimited time-frame to redeem these cards. Corporate branding is available for bulk & regular orders. Payments accepted on delivery.
